item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, April 15, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. It's easier than ever to de-censor videos (203 points | 75 comments)
2. What the hell is a target triple? (98 points | 59 comments)
3. Clolog (143 points | 23 comments)
4. Generate videos in Gemini and Whisk with Veo 2 (162 points | 71 comments)
5. Show HN: Unsure Calculator – back-of-a-napkin probabilistic calculator (75 points | 16 comments)
6. Cursor IDE support hallucinates lockout policy, causes mass user cancellations (67 points | 18 comments)
7. Liquid: Language Models Are Scalable and Unified Multi-Modal Generators (15 points | 1 comment)
8. Launch HN: mrge.io (YC X25) – Cursor for code review (145 points | 78 comments)
9. The case of the UI thread that hung in a kernel call (68 points | 13 comments)
10. Designing a low-cost high-performance 10 MHz – 15 GHz vector network analyzer (58 points | 10 comments)
11. 4chan Sharty Hack And Janitor Email Leak (324 points | 383 comments)
12. METS, the Middle English Texts Series (30 points | discuss)
13. Post-Silicon Validation of Static Lockstep Mode (26 points | 1 comment)
14. Canadian math prodigy allegedly stole $65M in crypto (78 points | 128 comments)
15. Amazfit activity tracker and watch face asset generation (7 points | discuss)
16. Chroma, Ubisoft's internal tool used to simulate color-blindness, open sourced (150 points | 44 comments)
17. Cohere Launches Embed 4 (70 points | 36 comments)
18. Teuken-7B-Base and Teuken-7B-Instruct: Towards European LLMs (229 points | 84 comments)
19. How the U.S. became a science superpower (172 points | 150 comments)
20. Hacking the Postgres wire protocol (133 points | 29 comments)
21. Fun ways of deciding authorship order (51 points | 23 comments)
22. MeshCore, a new lightweight, hybrid routing mesh protocol for packet radios (71 points | 28 comments)
23. How many supernova explode every year? (336 points | 167 comments)
24. How to win an argument with a toddler (498 points | 373 comments)
25. Show HN: Resonate – real-time high temporal resolution spectral analysis (50 points | 15 comments)
26. The Whimsical Investor (76 points | 10 comments)
27. Modern CMake (42 points | 22 comments)
28. M1: Towards Scalable Test-Time Compute with Mamba Reasoning Models (21 points | 2 comments)
29. Whistleblower details how DOGE may have taken sensitive NLRB data (609 points | 299 comments)
30. 7k-year-old skeletons from the green Sahara reveal a mysterious human lineage (78 points | 23 comments)
